name: Ch13BBaseConvo4
_source: speak;Ephraim;Forde, there you are.|How goes your watch over Myrrh?|Is she adjusting well to being around so many people?
speak;Ephraim;Yes, your watch.|Don't tell me you've forgotten your duty.
speak;Forde;Oh! That watch!|I thought it was Kyle's turn today.
speak;Ephraim;No, Forde.|Kyle was assigned to her yesterday.|Today was explicitly your responsibility.
speak;Forde;Are you certain?|I could have sworn that Kyle said...
speak;Forde;I... I don't know, Prince Ephraim.
speak;Forde;I may have... fallen asleep during my patrol.|When I woke up, she was gone.
speak;Ephraim;This is serious, Forde!|She's not familiar with this region!|And there have been reports of enemy scouts in the area!
speak;Forde;I know, Prince Ephraim.|I'm truly sorry.|I didn't mean to—
speak;Ephraim;Save your apologies.|Find her. Now!|Gather Kyle and Franz and begin searching immediately.
speak;Ephraim;Myrrh...|Where could she have gone?|I don't like the look of this situation at all.
speak;Ephraim;If anything happens to her...|No, I mustn't think that way.|We'll find her. We must.
